abstract: House Committee on Energy and Commerce calls for a hearing as soon as possible on the delay in beginning testing for human growth hormone in the NFL, but the players' union insists it needs more information about the threshold for positive tests; other NFL news noted.
snippet: The league’s new collective bargaining agreement calls for tests, but the players union said it needs more information first.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

lead_paragraph: The league’s new collective bargaining agreement calls for tests, but the players union said it needs more information first.

headline.main: Congress Wants Hearing on H.G.H. Testing in N.F.L.
headline.print_headline: House Members Seek Hearing On Delay in H.G.H. Testing
headline.seo: Congress Wants Hearing on H.G.H. Testing in N.F.L.
